scripts.dev:backend: npx kill-port 8081 || true && echo 'üöÄ Starting Go Backend on port 8081...' && cd server && go run cmd/api/main.go
scripts.clean: npx kill-port 3000 3005 8082 || true && rimraf admin/.next admin/node_modules/.cache
scripts.dev:emulator: pnpm run clean && pnpm run env:emulator && node start-emulator.js && concurrently "pnpm run server" "wait-on tcp:8081 && pnpm run admin" "wait-on tcp:8081 && pnpm run frontend" "wait-on tcp:8082 && pnpm run android" --names "SERVER,ADMIN,METRO,ANDROID" --prefix-colors "blue,yellow,magenta,green"
scripts.dev:usb: pnpm run clean && pnpm run env:usb && node adb-reverse.js && concurrently "pnpm run server" "wait-on tcp:8081 && pnpm run admin" "wait-on tcp:8081 && pnpm run frontend:clean" "wait-on tcp:8082 && pnpm run device" --names "SERVER,ADMIN,METRO,ANDROID" --prefix-colors "blue,yellow,magenta,green"
scripts.android:bundle: cd frontend && npx react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.dev:ios: pnpm run clean && pnpm run env:ios && node start-ios.js && concurrently "pnpm run admin" "pnpm run frontend" "wait-on tcp:8082 && pnpm run ios" --names "ADMIN,METRO,IOS" --prefix-colors "yellow,magenta,green"
scripts.android:prod: export JAVA_HOME="/Applications/Android Studio.app/Contents/jbr/Contents/Home" && pnpm run android:setup && pnpm run android:bundle && cd frontend && npx react-native run-android --mode=release
scripts.ios:prod: pnpm run ios:setup && cd frontend/ios && xcodebuild -workspace vedamatch.xcworkspace -scheme vedamatch -configuration Release -sdk iphonesimulator -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 17 Pro' build && xcrun simctl install booted ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/vedamatch-dsoltsxeayyfdqdhtfxuopvbotum/Build/Products/Release-iphonesimulator/vedamatch.app && xcrun simctl launch booted org.reactjs.native.example.vedamatch
scripts.build:release: pnpm run android:setup && pnpm run android:bundle && pnpm run android:build && pnpm run android:copy
